blogPost.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
blogPost.body: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
blogPost.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated
blogPost.author: Nicholas Chen

localize.description: 最简单、最现代的数据搜刮器作为一种服务，仿佛邮递员是自动的! 专注于开发依赖数据的应用程序，而不用担心数据收集基础设施。为聚合器、机器人和数据驱动的应用而生。
最簡單、最現代的數據搜刮器作爲一種服務，彷彿郵遞員是自動的! 專注於開發依賴數據的應用程序，而不用擔心數據收集基礎設施。爲聚合器、機器人和數據驅動的應用而生。

previous.excerpt: Money Minx is net worth and investments tracking - ⚡️ Connect with over 23,000 institutions 📈 Stocks, bonds, ETFs, Alternatives and more 👾 Cryptos too 💹 Multi currency support (USD, EUR, GBP, JPY,..) 😉 Compare to other investors 🎟 Investing community
previous.title: Money Minx - Track your net worth and investments in one place

localize.description: Money Minx是净值和投资跟踪 - ⚡️ 连接超过23,000个机构 📈 股票，债券，ETFs，替代产品和更多 👾 Cryptos太 💹 多货币支持（美元，欧元，英镑，日元，...） 😉 与其他投资者比较 🎟 投资社区
localize.tagline: 在一个地方跟踪您的净资产和投资

localize.description: Money Minx是淨值和投資跟蹤 - ⚡️ 連接超過23,000個機構 📈 股票，債券，ETFs，替代產品和更多 👾 Cryptos太 💹 多貨幣支持（美元，歐元，英鎊，日元，...） 😉 與其他投資者比較 🎟 投資社區
localize.tagline: 在一個地方跟蹤您的淨資產和投資

next.excerpt: Zoom Escaper is a tool to help you escape Zoom meetings and other videoconferencing scenarios. It allows you to self-sabotage your audio stream, making your presence unbearable to others. Made by: https://twitter.com/sam_lavigne
next.title: Zoom Escaper - Self-sabotage your audio stream and escape Zoom meetings

localize.description: Zoom Escaper是一款帮助你逃离Zoom会议和其他视频会议场景的工具。它允许你自我破坏你的音频流，让你的存在让别人无法忍受。制作者：https://twitter.com/sam_lavigne
localize.tagline: 自我破坏你的音频流，逃离Zoom会议。

localize.description: Zoom Escaper是一款幫助你逃離Zoom會議和其他視頻會議場景的工具。它允許你自我破壞你的音頻流，讓你的存在讓別人無法忍受。製作者：https://twitter.com/sam_lavigne
localize.tagline: 自我破壞你的音頻流，逃離Zoom會議。
